com.eep.taxe.mvc.menu

Class MenuView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.eep.taxe.mvc.menu.MenuView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class MenuView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This is the View for the Menu, a.k.a. the Menu GUI. Methods exposed by this class include those to add listeners to the buttons and those needed to update the table of available games.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
